author: Jon Emont
title: U.N. Warns More Rohingya Boats May Be in Danger at Sea
text:
The United Nations’ refugee agency warned Friday that more boats carrying Rohingya refugees may be stranded in the Andaman Sea on the eve of the dangerous monsoon season, ratcheting up concern for the Muslim minority following Myanmar military’s expulsion of hundreds of thousands from the country.

The U.N.’s alarm was sounded the same day that an Indonesian search-and-rescue mission found a boat with five starving Rohingya on board off the coast of Aceh province off the northern tip of Sumatra island, part of the long route...
